Welcome to HopeLink Companion, an AI cha: Welcome to HopeLink Companion, an AI chatbot assistant designed to provide guidance and assistance to refugees and immigrants. Our platform operates based on a knowledge-based system, where users are asked questions to provide tailored advice and suggestions.
